alfredsnippet.name: Joins all elements of an array into a string and returns this string. Uses a separator and an end separator.
alfredsnippet.snippet:
const join = (arr, separator = ',', end = separator) =>
  arr.reduce(
    (acc, val, i) =>
      i == arr.length - 2
        ? acc + val + end
        : i == arr.length - 1 ? acc + val : acc + val + separator,
    ''
  );
